U

UniversiActivity - Class in universum.studios.android.universi
An Activity implementation that provides Universi context features via UniversiActivityDelegate including other features described below.
UniversiActivity() - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.universi.UniversiActivity
Creates a new instance of UniversiActivity.
UniversiActivityContext - Interface in universum.studios.android.universi
Unified interface for activities provided by the Universi framework.
UniversiActivityDelegate - Class in universum.studios.android.universi
An UniversiContextDelegate implementation that can be used within context of Activity.
UniversiCompatActivity - Class in universum.studios.android.universi
An AppCompatActivity implementation with same Universi context features provided as UniversiActivity.
UniversiCompatActivity() - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.universi.UniversiCompatActivity
Creates a new instance of UniversiCompatActivity.
UniversiContextDelegate - Class in universum.studios.android.universi
Context delegate of which implementations are used by UniversiActivity, UniversiCompatActivity and UniversiActivity to provide features in unified 'fashion' regardless of context in which are these features supported.
UniversiFragment - Class in universum.studios.android.universi
An ActionBarFragment implementation that provides Universi context features via UniversiFragmentDelegate including other features described below.
UniversiFragment() - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.universi.UniversiFragment
 
UniversiFragmentDelegate - Class in universum.studios.android.universi
An UniversiContextDelegate implementation that can be used within context of Fragment.
universum.studios.android.universi - package universum.studios.android.universi
Provides 'universal' implementations of Activity and Fragment classes that may be used as base parents for all activities and fragments used across Android application.
unregisterRequest(int) - Method in class universum.studios.android.universi.UniversiContextDelegate
Removes request with the specified request flag from the registered ones.
